channel.title: Coding portals
channel.description: i need to know how to code portals at the clan wars, so that they are able to tele you into clan wars

item.title: Coding portals
item.dc:creator: @fantom fantom
item.description:
@fantom wrote:

commands would be cooler but ill give u both
make teleporter

makeGlobalObject(X-coords, Y-coords, 6551, 0, 10);//teleporter

make it so it teles you

if ((objectID == 6551) && (objectX == XXXX) && (objectY == YYYY)) { triggerTele(xxxx, yyyy, 0);

for command

if(command.startsWith("Command here")){ triggerTele(aaaa, bbbb, 0); sM("You have been teleported to (name of place)."); }
sorry if im wrong im just learning how to code and this is my first tutorial like thing

Read full topic
